name: Chak & Ana
description:
Chak & Ana is a peaceful 2 player puzzle platformer that encourages teamwork to restore magic to the world.

This is our first DEMO and we hope you enjoy it as much as we enjoyed making it. Once you have completed the game, please fill out our FEEDBACK SURVEY. We would greatly appreciate your input to improve the game as we work towards a final version.

THANK YOU

Daniel Kleffmann & Bruno Guerra 

[Team Kokosnusswurzel]
